data.persona: I am a local who has lived in the village my whole life. I know everyone that lives in the area. I enjoy striking up conversations with people.
data.description:
You are in the General Store.
The General store is painted a bright turquoise color, and is identified by the depiction of wheat crop that is carved into a wooden sign hanging from the store's front. There is a patio with a wooden roof hanging over head, and an arched wooden door that leads into the General store.
The camel is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I wish to steal the gold coins that are with in the satchel.
data.mid_motivation: I will hide the gold coins and satchel in the woods under a log.
data.long_motivation: I will use the gold coins to open up my own General Store.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hug the camel to gain it's trust.

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: hug the camel to keep it clam.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the woods to hide the loot.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: drop the satchel carrying the coins under a log.
